description: Gets information about the specified provisioning artifact (also known as a version) for the specified product.

parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description: The language code. jp - Japanese zh - Chinese.

nested_items.name: ProvisioningArtifactDetail
nested_items.description: Information about the provisioning artifact.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the provisioning artifact.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the provisioning artifact.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the provisioning artifact.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of provisioning artifact.
CLOUD_FORMATION_TEMPLATE - CloudFormation template.
TERRAFORM_OPEN_SOURCE - Terraform Open Source configuration file.
TERRAFORM_CLOUD - Terraform Cloud configuration file.
EXTERNAL - External configuration file.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The UTC time stamp of the creation time.

nested_items.name: Active
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the product version is active.

nested_items.name: Guidance
nested_items.description: Information set by the administrator to provide guidance to end users about which provisioning artifacts to use.

nested_items.name: SourceRevision
nested_items.description: Specifies the revision of the external artifact that was used to automatically sync the Service Catalog product and create the provisioning artifact. Service Catalog includes this response parameter as a high level field to the existing ProvisioningArtifactDetail type, which is returned as part of the response for CreateProduct, UpdateProduct, DescribeProductAsAdmin, DescribeProvisioningArtifact, ListProvisioningArtifact, and UpdateProvisioningArticat APIs.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the current request.

nested_items.name: ProvisioningArtifactParameters
nested_items.description: Information about the parameters used to provision the product.

nested_items.name: ParameterKey
nested_items.description: The parameter key.

nested_items.name: DefaultValue
nested_items.description: The default value.

nested_items.name: ParameterType
nested_items.description: The parameter type.

nested_items.name: IsNoEcho
nested_items.description: If this value is true, the value for this parameter is obfuscated from view when the parameter is retrieved. This parameter is used to hide sensitive information.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the parameter.

nested_items.name: ParameterConstraints
nested_items.description: Constraints that the administrator has put on a parameter.

nested_items.name: AllowedValues
nested_items.description: The values that the administrator has allowed for the parameter.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: AllowedPattern
nested_items.description: A regular expression that represents the patterns that allow for String types. The pattern must match the entire parameter value provided.

nested_items.name: ConstraintDescription
nested_items.description: A string that explains a constraint when the constraint is violated. For example, without a constraint description, a parameter that has an allowed pattern of [A-Za-z0-9]+ displays the following error message when the user specifies an invalid value:

nested_items.name: MaxLength
nested_items.description: An integer value that determines the largest number of characters you want to allow for String types.

nested_items.name: MinLength
nested_items.description: An integer value that determines the smallest number of characters you want to allow for String types.

nested_items.name: MaxValue
nested_items.description: A numeric value that determines the largest numeric value you want to allow for Number types.

nested_items.name: MinValue
nested_items.description: A numeric value that determines the smallest numeric value you want to allow for Number types.
